Any command windows, referred to here, do (eg "mkdir C: \ a" - will create a folder "a" on the drive C). Also, run any file (eg "notepad.exe", "C: \ 1.html").
The data that will give enter commands or program. For example, if you run "explorer" with the argument "http://Algoritm2.ru", then you will open your browser to the site of the algorithm.

argument.name: Simulate the next set of text

arguments.argument: The text specified here (specify the text in double quotes) will be printed in the active window or application, during the execution of this action.
The number of wheel revolutions.

Here you must specify the path to the folder. The path should be marked in quotation marks, eg "C: \ folder \" or \ folder (in the second case, the folder "Folder" should be located in the folder with the project)

Enter here the name of the file you want to find. You can use the search characters, such as "*","?","+". For example, "a *. jpg" - find all files with extension jpg, starting with "A" (for example, "abcdef.jpg", "a2.jpg", "a.jpg"). "a? c.exe" - will find all the applications, consisting of three letters beginning with "a" and ending in "s" (for example, "abc.exe", "a2c.exe")
The file can be written using different encodings (ASCII, UTF8). Here you can specify which encoding to use to open the file.
If you pass a data word "Yes", it will be photographed from the desktop only the active application window. If "No", all located on the screen.

argument.name: A new path to the file

arguments.argument: Place where it will be necessary to copy or move a file. For example, "C: \ 1.jpg" or "\ 2.jpg" (in the second case, the file "2.jpg" will be located in the folder with the project).

argument.name: The path to the file or folder

arguments.argument: Here you must specify the path to the file or folder. The path should be marked in quotation marks, eg "C: \ 1.jpg" or "\ 2.jpg" (in the second case, the file "2.jpg" must be located in the folder with the project).
Indicates whether this property is set in the file (meaning "yes") or not ( "None").
It should specify the time in double quotes, like this "16/07/2009 0:29:31".
File where to save the screenshot.
The path to the key or a folder in the registry in double quotes. For example, "HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE \ SOFTWARE \ Microsoft \ Windows \ CurrentVersion \ Run" or "HKCU \ Control Panel \ Mouse"
The value of the registry key
The registry has several types of keys (string, number, binary number). Enter here the desired type.
The line number that you need. The first row is number 1, second 2, etc.
Number of characters that you want. The first character has number 1, second 2, etc.

Where to find the string. For example if the domain sampling "Leased lines" that this feature will show only the selected rows and seek only to them.
List the rows, separated by commas within double quotes, for example, "0,1,8,3" or "2".
List the columns separated by commas within double quotes, for example, "0,1,8,3" or "2".

Here you want to specify the columns that will be made of. If the column is one, you can ukat so: "0" - the first column, or "2" - the third. If more than one, then: "0,1,3" - the first second and fourth column.

Here you want to specify the string that will be made of. If the string is one, you can ukat so: "0" - the first line or "2" - the third. If more than one, then: "0,1,3" - the first second and fourth lines.
Column number, which you need. The first column is number 0, second 1, etc.

argument.name: SQL query changes in the database

arguments.argument: SQL query in order to change the data in the database (queries INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE), for example, "DELETE * FROM table_name"
Database - an organized repository of information. The algorithm supports two types of long Databases: Access and Excel.
String that is common to the sample. The first line has the number "0".
Insert will occur before the line number specified here.
If "Yes" - the sorting is ascending, "No" - descending

(Jpg | gif | png)" matches "Risunok1.jpg", "Risunok1.gif, but not suitable for" Risunok1.jpeg "or" Risunok1gif. "

The original date to which you want to add anything. Written in double quotation marks, eg "16/07/2009 0:29:31".

X coordinate on the object. The count goes from left to right, ie the left edge of the object X = 0, and X is maximal on the right (to the width of the object)
Y coordinate on the object. The countdown goes down, ie the upper edge of the object Y = 0, and at the bottom of Y is maximal (equal to the heights of the object)
